actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to declare the sense of Congress that Smokey the Bear shall be returned to his place of birth, Capitan, N. Mex.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that when Smokey the Bear goes to that great honey tree in the sky it is just and fitting that he shall be returned home to his place of birth, Capitan, New Mexico, for proper burial and a permanent memorial among the cool green mountains where he was born.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to declare the sense of Congress that Smokey the Bear shall be returned to his place of birth, Capitan, N. Mex.
